title: Bug 18705 - Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example exhibits excessive flashing when resizing the window in the vertical direction. This issue affects all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window vertically, I observed excessive flashing on all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames.
EB: I would expect the Control Example to resize smoothly without any flashing on the tabs or Frames when resizing the window vertically.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Launch the Control Example. 2. Resize the window in the vertical direction. 3. Observe the excessive flashing on all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames.
